product_overview: RingPOS is a cloud-based, multi-tenant Point of Sale (POS) system designed to support Retail, Food & Beverage (F&B), and Service-based businesses. It provides role-based user access, tenant data isolation, and tailored features for each business mode, delivering an all-in-one solution for business operations, sales, and inventory management.
core_goals: Provide secure role-based authentication with persistent session management.
Enable multi-tenant support with isolated data access for each business tenant.
Offer adaptive dashboards and POS flows tailored to Retail, F&B, and Service business modes.
Facilitate comprehensive CRUD operations for product and tenant management.
Support efficient POS cashier workflows including cart and payment processing.
Present detailed order histories with filtering and expandable details.
Deliver actionable sales reporting and analytics.
Maintain a user-friendly settings interface for application customization and management.
key_features: JWT-based secure authentication supporting roles: Superadmin, Owner, and Staff.
Multi-tenant dashboards adapting dynamically based on business type (Retail, F&B, Service).
Complete product management with CRUD, category filtering, stock tracking, and tenant isolation.
POS cashier interface with product grid, cart management, payment processing (Cash, Card, E-Wallet), and receipt generation.
Comprehensive order history view with filters for order status and date, including expandable order details.
Integrated sales reporting with charts and daily sales insights.
Settings module for general app configuration, user management, and printer settings.
F&B-specific features like table management, kitchen display, and order modifiers.
Service mode capabilities including calendar bookings and staff management.
Superadmin panel for multi-tenant CRUD operations and user impersonation.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via username and password; system authenticates and authorizes based on role.
Upon login, user is directed to a mode-specific dashboard (Retail, F&B, Service) with a contextual sidebar and key stats.
Owners and staff perform product management tasks: adding, editing, deleting, categorizing, and searching products.
Staff use POS cashier screens to select products, manage the cart, and process payments.
Users access order history to view and filter past orders and expand for detailed views.
Superadmins manage tenants through the multi-tenant panel including creating, editing, deleting tenants and impersonating tenant users.
Users configure application settings including user roles, printer setup, and business preferences.
validation_criteria: User authentication validates credentials and enforces role-based access correctly.
Tenant data isolation is tested to prevent cross-tenant data visibility or manipulation.
All product CRUD operations function correctly with appropriate UI feedback.
POS transactions complete with accurate cart totals and payment processing.
Order histories display without data errors and all filters and detail expansion work as intended.
Sales reports reflect accurate aggregated data for given time frames.
Settings changes persist and affect application behavior accordingly.
Superadmin tenant management performs full CRUD and impersonation securely, without data leakage.
